name: Wolkenfels
description: «Wolkenfels» (literally, «rock in the clouds») is a game that aims to make it easier to switch off after a tiring day. Players find themselves on a cozy island in the clouds where they can make themselves feel better. A constantly changing and lively world awaits them there, and together with other players they can uncover old secrets, care for the island and participate in festivities on certain days.
